MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell, affecting properties in Lomond Walk and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.14am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Yetts substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.07am on Friday 23rd October 2020.
